nodes.text: Lliandri was a female green-skinned Twi'lek who worked as a bounty hunter during the Galactic Civil War.

Lliandri was sold into slavery at an early age, but she escaped her owner and managed to eke out a living on Ord Mantell. Later, she accidentally killed a criminal on Ord Mantell in self-defense, and despite her sadness at the death, she relished the reward she got from the local authorities. It was then that she chose to become a bounty hunter.

She was tall with dark eyes. She favored using dual heavy blaster pistols. She frequently dressed revealingly and often used this in conjunction with her constantly in motion head-tails to distract her prey.
As a hunter, Lliandri refused to take Imperial contracts because the Empire allowed slavery. She was also an associate of the bounty hunter Tern Ashandrik.
